title: Main
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The main tag represents the main content section of the HTML document.

usageExamples.title: Basic Example
usageExamples.description: A basic example using the main tag.
usageExamples.code:
Main Content

This is the main content of the page.
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/main
	/h1
		Main Content
	/p
		This is the main content of the page.

usageExamples.title: Usage with Sections
usageExamples.description: Using the main tag with multiple sections within it.
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/main
	/section
		/h2
			Section 1
		/p
			Content of section 1.
	/section
		/h2
			Section 2
		/p
			Content of section 2.
